projects.title: Challenjeu
projects.content: Social platform that lets you create and share challenges with others. Set and achieve your goals with the support of a community, follow each other's progress, and communicate to exchange ideas and stay motivated.

projects.title: MonMate
projects.content: Manage MongoDB with MonMate! Create, edit, and delete connections, collections, and documents. Enjoy built-in editor, sorting, and filtering.
